subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rafer Alston, who has explored every corner of the basketball universe in the last 10 years, is now the starting point guard for one of the N.B.A.’s best teams.
snippet: Rafer Alston, who has explored every corner of the basketball universe in the last 10 years, is now the starting point guard for one of the N.B.A.’s best teams.
